meanings.sent1: The salad dressing was nonoily and light, perfect for a refreshing meal.
meanings.sent2: Her skin felt smooth and nonoily after using the new face wash.
meanings.sent3: The nonoily car engine ran smoothly without any greasy residue.
meanings.sent4: The nonoily surface of the water reflected the clear blue sky above.
meanings.sent5: The nonoily paint dried quickly without leaving any oily marks.

meanings.definition: Without an oily texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The nonoily hair conditioner left her hair soft and manageable.
meanings.sent2: The nonoily sunscreen protected her skin without making it greasy.
meanings.sent3: The nonoily frying pan made cooking a breeze without any oily splatters.
meanings.sent4: Her nonoily hands were perfect for handling delicate fabrics without leaving stains.
meanings.sent5: The nonoily lotion absorbed quickly into her skin, leaving it smooth and hydrated.
